snippet: Platon A. Lebedev, an associate of the oil tycoon Mikhail B. Khodorovsky, had his prison sentence reduced in a rare show of leniency amid a spate of criminal cases against opposition leaders.
abstract: Russian court reduces the prison sentence of Platon A Lebedev, a business partner of the oil tycoon Mikhail B Khodorkovsky, in a rare show of leniency amid a spate of criminal cases against opposition leaders.
lead_paragraph: Platon A. Lebedev, an associate of the oil tycoon Mikhail B. Khodorovsky, had his prison sentence reduced in a rare show of leniency amid a spate of criminal cases against opposition leaders.
